msg: avoid recursive call when onDettach calls setObject (which is quite common)

author: ehillenius
msg: avoid recursive call when onAttach calls setObject (which is quite common)

author: ehillenius
msg: you can now attach an image to a cd by uploading one. A dynamic thumbnail image is created when an image is coupled, otherwise a special (question mark) image is shown. Furthermore, when a thumbnail is clicked, its original version is displayed in a popup that resizes according to the image dimensions and that is closed when you click on the image.

author: ehillenius
msg: made getResource public so that it can be used with decorators etc
